summary: This is a grand jury subpoena issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to Century Link, demanding telephone records for the period 2002-2006 in connection with an investigation into violations of federal sex trafficking and coercion statutes. The document includes a request for non-disclosure to preserve the confidentiality of the investigation.

persons.name: Geoffrey S. Berman
persons.context: Issued and signed the grand jury subpoena and the accompanying letter requesting non-disclosure of the subpoena to preserve investigation confidentiality.

events.title: Grand Jury Appearance Date
events.description: The subpoena commands the custodian of records for Century Link to appear before the grand jury to testify and produce records, though personal appearance is waived if records are produced by this date.

events.title: Investigation Timeframe
events.description: The subpoena requests all records for specific telephone numbers for this five-year period, indicating the scope of the criminal investigation.

locations: United States Courthouse, 40 Foley Square, Room 220, Manhattan, New York, NY
Century Link, 5454 West 110th Street, Overland Park, Kansas 66211
The Silvio J. Mollo Building, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The subpoena is part of an official criminal investigation into suspected felony violations of 18 U.S.C. §§ 1591 (sex trafficking), 1594(c) (attempt/conspiracy to commit sex trafficking), and 2422(b) (coercion/enticement).
The investigation is active and confidential, with a specific request to Century Link not to disclose the existence of the subpoena to any third party.
The subpoena seeks extensive telephone records (calls, SMS, subscriber info, IP history) for specific numbers from January 1, 2002, through December 31, 2006.
The document notes that the targeted phone number may have been serviced by Level 3 Communications during the relevant timeframe.
